articles.content:

articles.author: Tom Westbrook
articles.title: Stocks shrug off virus worries; ECB in focus - Reuters
articles.description: Asian stocks rallied on Thursday, bonds nursed losses and oil held onto sharp gains as investors seemed to set aside virus jitters for now and looked ahead to the European Central Bank for reassurance that policy support will continue for some time.
